name: Aistore Support Ticket
author: susheelhbti

sections.description:
1 Support Ticket
User can submit support ticket from the front end and admin can answer ticket from the backend.

2 E-mail notifications
System send email notifications when any event created in the support ticket like any replay added.

3 Restricted access
User will see his own tickets and admin will see all tickets created on the system.

4 Multiple category
From admin panel wordpress admin can create ticket category so that

5 Unlimited Tickets
User can create unlimited tickets and admin can create unlimited admin and all can answer the ticket
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. “Dashboard”->”Settings”->”Aistore support ticket”
  4. There are some examples on the settings page,
